name: Space Flight Simulator
description:
Currently docking is only included with the intent to dock with Agena as fast as possible using minimal fuel to score maximum points.

Overtime this will develop into a full space simulator with the ability to control a mission from launch to recovery.

Currently Available:

  • Gemini - Agena

Planned Scenarios:

  • Apollo - LEM
  • Apollo - Soyuz
  • Shuttle - ISS
  • Shuttle - MIR

Future Features:

  • Moon Landing
  • Electric, Fuel and crew management
  • Advanced systems
  • Failures
  • Renedavouz
  • Reentry
  • Launch

Comments and feedback highly appreciated.
